column4: How would one go about setting up an external monitor to work with ubuntu? (I'm using it on my laptop right now and I have a bigger monitor plugged into the video card)
bastid: how did you get your 2nd monitor set up in the first place? that's what I'm trying to do.
xinerama.. i set it up by the GUI tool in gutsy
gutsy did it all. i didn't really do anything
